mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ( order_batch_id, order_id, sum_money, actually_money, pay_type, create_date, creator, create_ip ) VALUES ( #{orderBatchId}, #{orderId}, #{sumMoney}, #{actuallyMoney}, #{payType}, NOW(), #{creator}, #{createIp} )
mapper.select: SELECT id, order_batch_id, order_id AS orderId, sum_money AS sumMoney, cast(actually_money AS actuallyMoney, pay_type AS payType FROM WHERE id = #{id}
